cells.data:
### Up Next:
- [ ] Setup gunicorn upstart conf
- [ ] Actually store logs for live debugging

### Before Demo:
- [ ] Run update demo urls - run
- [ ] Remove CORS origin allow all in Django
- [ ] Rate Throttling for Register and Auth
- [ ] get_trend_setters_queryset - have it use some random user id's

### Small Things to tackle eventually
- [ ] Favorite Category population based on uploaded videos
- [ ] Paginate /videos/top/
- [ ] Update favorite categories for users.
- [ ] Periodic failure checking and requeue for failed video processing
- [ ] Route 53 Transfered to Org on AWS
- [ ] After profling slap a Varnish server in front. Load Test again.

### July Deliverables
- [x] Profile Creation
- [x] Avatars
- [x] Video Upload
- [x] Video Ranked
- [x] Video Transcode / Storage / Relation
- [x] User Following
- [x] Basic Search
- [x] Featured User increased ranking weight [Unecessary]
- [x] Basic Analytics

### Before Production:
 - [ ] Varnish!
 - [ ] Update CodeDeploy Permissions for code deploy user. More restrictive
 - [ ] See if Python 3.6 is available on Amazon Yum Repo.
 - [ ] Update CORS configuration on ranked-video-upload S3 bucket... lock the allowed down.
 - [ ] MemCache / Caching implementation.
 - [ ] LOTS!

### Done:
- [x] Load Test
- [x] Unit Tests for Put/Patch on /users/<id>
- [x] Make sure to run migration for profile e-mail and import job on demo DB
- [x] Local_Settings.py - regen secret key
- [x] Redo Admin p/w and setup POSTGRES DB
- [x] Spin up a middle-tier cache server
- [x] Run 0 fixture and import on a demo box.
- [x] Setup API Demo Environment
- [x] Spin up another couple of app boxes
- [x] Create Demo DB
- [x] Base analytics support
- [x] Create a way to acquire ids of videos that a user has already ranked.
- [x] Cloudfront for Videos
- [x] Cloudfront for Static Files
- [x] Profile and improve <all> endpoint queries
- [x] Create call for setting 'views' on video.
- [x] Fix chmod not setting execution properties on .sh script.
- [x] AWS Transcode to 1:1
- [x] Parse #'s from the video title/caption
- [x] Add average rank to videos (will have to be mocked - no ranking algorithm for V1)
- [x] Properly set is_ranked_10 on videos .. periodically
- [x] Implement new /search endpoint
- [x] Update Profile serializer to render categories
- [x] Limit videos to followers
- [x] Disable /api/v1/users/ list
- [x] Update follower / following count on Profile (Make sure it's Atomic)
- [x] Add profile counts to /users/<id> endpoint
- [x] Add top 10 ranked count to profile
- [x] Add Mocked Ranked_10 count for profile page.
- [x] Cloudfront for Static
- [x] Comment out profile update on deployment
- [x] Create import / update job for profiles/videos (from spreadsheet)
- [x] Import form for Taylor
- [x] Make sure to update the documentation for /users/{user_id} - include 'videos' 
- [x] Set LightProfile model for multiple endpoints.
- [x] Remove E-Mail from serialized profile info on video detail
- [x] Functional API Endpoints [ Search ]
- [x] Ability to see who follows a user.
- [x] Avatar Upload Front-End Help for Greg
- [x] Setup Profile Following.
- [x] Verify Patch/PUT on Videos/detail
- [x] Update Profile Put/Patch
- [x] Create some demo data for Greg
- [x] RDS Setup for shared DB
- [x] Create Categories on dev DB
- [x] Upload category assets to S3
- [x] Fix NGINX static hosting.
- [x] Update Swagger Documentation for Videos
- [x] Functional API Endpoints [ Video ]
- [x] Functional API Endpoints [ Video - Rank ]
- [x] Functional API Endpoints [ Video - Comment ]
- [x] Functional API Endpoints [ Categories ]
- [x] Fix the issue of a 500 when there are no videos.
- [x] Video Ranking
- [x] Video Commenting
- [x] Create Auto-Deploy for Greg
- [x] Video Endpoint Setup
- [x] Video Endpoint Tweaks
- [x] Video Auto-Transcode Capability
- [x] Video Upload Capability
- [x] Avatar Uploads functionality
- [x] [Roll in Django OAuth](quiver-note-url/1436ADF9-7D48-435E-BF0D-E6D4017DF71A)
- [x] Add authorization header to API documentation .. all secure endpoints.
- [x] Finish API Documentation
- [x] Deployment stalling during afterInstall (gunicorn direct not daemon - upstart)
- [x] Create SNS Listener for Transcode DONE / ERROR
- [x] Listen to AWS SNS for - 'RankedEncodingDone' and 'RankedEncodingFailed'
- [x] Clean up old, non finished uploading files on S3 and video relations locally.
